text: In figure, two positive charges, q2 and q3 fixed along the y axis, exert a net electric force in the +x-direction on a charge fixed along the x-axis. If a positive charge Q is added at (x, 0), the force on q1:

options.a: Shall increase along the positive x-axis.
options.b: Shall decrease along the positive x-axis.
options.c: Shall point along the negative x-axis.
options.d: Shall increase but the direction changes because of the intersection of Q with <math><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> and <math><msub><mi>q</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>.
